mapper.update: UPDATE mon_device_real SET access_type = #{accessType}, access_status = #{accessStatus}, device_software_status = #{deviceSoftwareStatus}, antenna_status = #{antennaStatus}, warning_content = #{warningContent}, cpu_rate = #{cpuRate}, storage_rate = #{storageRate}, error_rate = #{errorRate}, occurrence_time = #{occurrenceTime}, remarks = #{remarks}, device_warning_num = #{deviceWarningNum} WHERE device_exists = 0 and device_name = #{deviceName}
mapper.select: select date_format(t1.equipment_exchange_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as recordDate, sum(CASE abn_type WHEN "101" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "activeWarn", sum(CASE abn_type WHEN "100" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "hardWarn" from log_log t1 where t1.log_type = 108 group by date_format(t1.equipment_exchange_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY t1.equipment_exchange_time desc limit 0,7
select count(*) as "warnTotal", sum(CASE warning_type WHEN "101" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "activeWarn", sum(CASE warning_type WHEN "100" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "hardWarn" from mon_device_abn
select b.process_name name, count(b.process_name) value from mon_device_abn a left JOIN base_process_info b on a.use_process=b.process_id group by b.process_name
select count(*) as eqiOnline from mon_soft_status where device_so_run_status = "101"
select count(*) as accessOnline from mon_equipment_status where access_status = "101"

SELECT bpi.process_name name, count(bpi.process_name) value FROM eqi_equipment AS eqi LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id group by bpi.process_name

SELECT bfi.factory_id FROM eqi_equipment AS eqi LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bpi.factory_id = bfi.factory_id group by bfi.factory_id

SELECT bpi.process_name processName FROM eqi_equipment AS eqi LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id group by bpi.process_name

SELECT bfi.factory_id, bfi.factory_name, bpi.process_name processName, count(bpi.process_id) as total, bpi.process_id FROM eqi_equipment AS eqi LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bpi.factory_id = bfi.factory_id group by bpi.process_id
